description: Development of broad-spectrum antibiotic targeting resistant bacteria
objectives: Identify lead compounds with novel mechanisms of action against MRSA and other resistant pathogens

description: Optimizing CAR-T cell therapy for solid tumors
objectives: Enhance CAR-T cell persistence and tumor penetration in solid tumor microenvironment

description: Discovery and validation of early-stage Alzheimer's biomarkers
objectives: Develop blood-based test for early AD detection using proteomics

description: Novel small molecule targeting insulin receptor sensitization
objectives: Restore insulin sensitivity in Type 2 diabetes through novel pathway modulation

description: Development of anti-fibrotic agent for heart failure

description: Inhaled biologic formulation for severe asthma
objectives: Develop stable inhaled antibody formulation targeting IL-5/IL-13

description: Novel non-opioid treatment for neuropathic pain
objectives: Identify and validate Nav1.7 channel modulator for chronic pain

description: Targeted microbiome modulation for autoimmune diseases
objectives: Engineer probiotic strains for IBD and rheumatoid arthritis treatment

description: AAV-based gene therapy for inherited retinal diseases
objectives: Develop safe and efficient AAV vector for RPE65 gene delivery

description: Overcome artemisinin resistance in Plasmodium falciparum
objectives: Identify combination therapy to prevent resistance emergence
